discussion.content: B & D because: The integrated systems are disconnected from the Internet. The workloads in the user subscriptions have Internet access.
On the exam (06/24/2022), different format but not part of a case study

Selected Answer: AC
A and C.

questions.question_text:
You need to recommend a business continuity and disaster recovery plan for the dev1 and dev2 regions that meets the technical requirements.
Which two recommendations should you make? Each correct answer presents part of the solution.
NOTE: Each correct selection is worth one point.

choices.D: Use Infrastructure as Code (IaC) by using Azure Resource Manager templates
choices.B: Use an Azure Marketplace backup tool in each region to protect the virtual machines that run in the other region

choices.D: Add an additional scale unit node
choices.C: Install the AMD drivers on the virtual machines
choices.B: Install the NVIDIA drivers on the virtual machines
choices.A: Redeploy the virtual machines to a new Azure Stack Hub node

discussion.content: Yes. The right answer is B. The case says it uses NC series workloads which are GPU based powered by Nvidia processor and not AMD
There is no NCas N series VM type, there is only NVas. This is a typo in the question. I believe they intended AMD, hence the 'as' suffix

sceneria:
Users in the priv1 region recently deployed NCas_v4 virtual machines for various AI workload. The users discover that the virtual machines do not use GPUs.
The NCasT4_v3-series virtual machines are powered by Nvidia Tesla T4 GPUs and AMD EPYC 7V12(Rome) => so the answer should be C
CPUs
